actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a refundable credit against the individual income tax for tuition paid for the elementary or secondary education of dependents.

summary.text: Allows a refundable tax credit under the Internal Revenue Code against the individual income tax for tuition paid for the elementary or secondary education of dependents at a private, nonprofit school. States that such tax credit shall be limited to 50 percent of tuition paid of $400, whichever is less.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a refundable credit against the individual income tax for tuition paid for the elementary or secondary education of dependents.
